Name: VeraCrypt
Description: VeraCrypt is an open-source disk encryption software that provides on-the-fly encryption.
HTU: Install VeraCrypt, create an encrypted volume or encrypt a partition/drive, and use it to store sensitive data securely.

Name: GnuPG
Description: GnuPG is a free implementation of the OpenPGP standard, providing encryption and signing of data and communications.
HTU: Install GnuPG, generate a key pair, use `gpg` commands to encrypt/decrypt data, and sign/verify messages.

Name: Cryptomator
Description: Cryptomator is an open-source encryption tool for cloud storage that provides transparent client-side encryption of files.
HTU: Install Cryptomator, create a vault, add files to the vault, and access them securely through the virtual drive.

Name: EncFS
Description: EncFS is an open-source cryptographic filesystem that provides encryption for directories and files.
HTU: Install EncFS, create an encrypted directory, and use it to securely store files.

Name: DiskCryptor
Description: DiskCryptor is an open-source disk encryption tool that supports full disk and partition encryption.
HTU: Install DiskCryptor, choose the disk or partition to encrypt, and follow the steps to complete the encryption process.
